Social Impact

Social Impact Consulting Social Enterprises Ecosystem Builders

Patamar Capital

Location: San Francisco, CA

http://patamar.com/

An impact-oriented venture capital firm that invests in high-growing companies that solves South and Southeast Asia’s most pervasive social problems at scale. This for-profit investment company invests in scalable businesses that improves the lives of the poor by engaging the working poor while aiming for high financial and social returns. Past investments include: Kinara in India, Ruma in Indonesia, Kalibrr in Philippines, Trust Circle in Vietnam, and UPay in Sri Lanka.

Global Impact Investing Network

Location: New York City, NY

http://thegiin.org/

A membership-based community of impact investors and mission-driven organizations. GIIN contributes to the building of the social impact ecosystem by publishing reports on the developments and research regarding impact investing.

Tides Foundation

Location: San Francisco, CA

https://www.tides.org/

Tides is a 'Philanthropic partner and nonprofit accelerator dedicated to build a world of shared prosperity and social justice.' Their approach is reliant on bridging unlikely partners together such as corporate partners, individual donors, social change leaders, and foundations in order to advance social good.
